description: By analogy with the ancient Spartans, who famously possessed these qualities.

adjectives.description: spartan (comparative more spartan, superlative most spartan)

examples: I went on the retreat to the monastery, thinking I would be sleeping in a spartan cell, only to discover a simple but comfortable bedroom.

entries.meaning: Resolute in the face of danger or adversity.
examples: The spartan legionaries vowed to fight to the death.
After ten years as a fashion designer in the rough-and-tumble Garment District, Eloise left New York for the spartan but serene life of a farmer's wife.
